data.title: Billy Preston
data.text:
Born: 9-Sep-1946

Birthplace: Houston, TX

Died: 6-Jun-2006

Location of death: Scottsdale, AZ [1]

Cause of death: Kidney failure

Remains: Buried, Inglewood Park Cemetery, Inglewood, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: Black

Occupation: Singer/Songwriter

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: You Are So Beautiful

[1] Scottsdale Healthcare Shea Hospital.

The Beatles Keyboardist (1969)

The Rolling Stones Keyboardist (1971-77)

Drug Possession: Cocaine 1992 (no contest)

Drug Possession: Cocaine 1992 (no contest)

Insurance Fraud 1998 (set fire to his own house, guilty plea)

Violating Bail 1991 (guilty, 3 years jail)

Drug Possession

Kidney Transplant 2002

Tracheotomy Jan-2006

Coma (21-Nov-2005 to 6-Jun-2006, his death)

Risk Factors: Alcoholism, Cocaine

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Derby Stallion (4-Jul-2005)

Concert for George (3-Oct-2003) · Himself

Ticker (23-Jun-2001)

Blues Brothers 2000 (6-Feb-1998) · Louisiana Gator Boys

Wired (25-Aug-1989) · Himself

Blame It on the Night (2-Nov-1984) · Himself

The Compleat Beatles (1-Feb-1984) · Himself

Stony Island (17-Nov-1978) · Himself

Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band (24-Jul-1978)

The Concert for Bangladesh (23-Mar-1972) · Himself

Let It Be (13-May-1970) · Himself

St. Louis Blues (7-Apr-1958)

Official Website:

http://www.billypreston.net/
